name: RANBASED
description: The reference token/commodity, is chosen by the Ranbased community. This function is jokingly referred to as Ran Wars. Users can send a transaction to change the pair at random from the options in the pool if they want to change things up. Why change the Rebase Pair, you ask? There are a few reasons. One is to achieve a positive rebase - if the current pair's price action isn't leading to a positive rebase, you can wish to change to a new pair that has a greater probability of triggering a positive rebase. You can choose the tempo because RANB is your token.
